post.body: Merry Christmas Eve to you too! The crystallized ginger is gone, baby, gone! Wish I could've shared it with ya! =D
Yay for antibiotics! I hope you feel better. I could use some of that Phenergan w/Codeine. Merry Christmas to you and yours!
Have a safe, lucky trip!!!
@hulamom Mahalo! Here's hoping it's not too chilly!
The joy of having my car waiting for me when I need it. But...
Why yes, that is crystallized ginger! :-)
Depends on what's left! :-)
Good to see you too! Sorry, I was in Laie after I saw you =D
Oops! Missed you on that, but nice! =D
@Melissa808 Nice!
Checking in from rainy, chilly Hilo. Hope you all had as wonderful a Christmas as I did with my family. Merry Christmas and g'night!
Made it to Hilo. I can already hear the coqui frogs saying hello!
Cruising at the airport waiting for the plane to Hilo. Parking was a surprising breeze - nice holiday gift, no?
Gotta be at the airport by 4:30. Cab or park?
http://twitpic.com/vndr - Yummy! Can you believe I baked this? Happy Holidays!!
Note to City: must you do construction at every access point to Kuakini at the same time? Just a thought.
http://twitpic.com/v7by - The Christmas Village lives again after a few years on vacay
Considering venturing out for the last of the Christmas shopping on the west side... Is Simply Organized worth it?
Why am I addicted to the Rachel Zoe Project marathon on Bravo? I die!
I spy Dennis Oda @Starbucks with his camera. Wonder if he's working?
